title: Paxos debuts USDG0 to extend its regulated stablecoin across multiple blockchains
description: The new omnichain token brings fully backed dollar liquidity to Hyperliquid, Plume and Aptos while keeping a single regulated supply across networks.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Bitcoin charts flag $75K bottom, but analysts predict 40% rally before 2025 ends
description: Bitcoin whales are accelerating their purchasing despite BTC’s short-term bearish outlook. Meanwhile, Wall Street analysts expect BTC to hit new all-time highs before the end of 2025.

title: Regulator clarifies US banks can handle gas fees using crypto holdings
description: The OCC said authorized national banks could hold crypto under specific circumstances, citing examples under the recently passed GENIUS act.

title: Bitcoin finally bounces, outpacing stocks ahead of Nvidia earnings: Will the BTC rally hold?
description: Bitcoin jumped 4% as US equities dropped ahead of Nvidia’s earnings report, but onchain data noted weak institutional demand. Does data show BTC's rebound as a sign of spot buying?

title: ETH falls into ‘buy zone,’ but volatility-averse traders take a wait-and-see approach
description: Ether retests $3,000 as its Mayer Multiple falls below 1, entering a historical buy zone, while liquidity clusters signal short-term volatility ahead.

title: Stablecoin giant Tether backs Ledn, targets global crypto lending
description: The investment from the stablecoin giant coincides with accelerating institutional interest and Wall Street participation in the crypto-backed loans sector.

title: 'Crypto Winter Is Here' — Mark Yusko Explains What May Come Next
description: In a recent Cointelegraph interview, Mark Yusko outlined the indicators pointing to a Bitcoin bear market and the forces shaping the road ahead.

title: The hijacking of the American dream: Why Bitcoin is for everyone — Author
description: Cyclical financial crises and the steady growth of the money supply have eroded the ability to build capital and achieve social mobility.

title: Institutions lean into crypto despite Bitcoin price slump
description: Institutions across the globe are adopting cryptocurrency, offering new services and buying into blockchain tech, despite slumping Bitcoin price.

title: Tether Dives Into Bitcoin-Backed Lending as Market Soars Past $1B in Loans
description: Tether has invested in Ledn as bitcoin-backed lending has accelerated, with $2.8B in loans and over $1B issued in 2025, while revenue above $100M and tighter risk controls point to a cautious crypto credit market as regulators add stricter lending rules. The post Tether Dives Into Bitcoin-Backed Lending as Market Soars Past $1B in Loans appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Grab Signs Web3 Deal with StraitsX to Bring Stablecoin Payments Into Its Super-App
description: Grab has partnered with StraitsX to explore embedding a Web3 settlement layer in its super-app, using stablecoin wallets, programmable payments and onchain clearing to streamline cross-border consumer and merchant transactions across eight Southeast Asian markets. The post Grab Signs Web3 Deal with StraitsX to Bring Stablecoin Payments Into Its Super-App appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: [LIVE] Altcoin Price Watch: Aster and Zcash Rally Amid Bitcoin Breakdown Below $90,000 – Is This Just the Beginning?
description: Altcoin markets have experienced renewed turbulence after Bitcoin has slipped below $90,000, wiping out 2025 gains and triggering broad liquidations, while Aster and Zcash have shown relative strength amid ETF outflows, macro uncertainty, and a bearish technical setup. The post [LIVE] Altcoin Price Watch: Aster and Zcash Rally Amid Bitcoin Breakdown Below $90,000 – Is This Just the Beginning? appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Deutsche Börse Brings MiCA-Ready Stablecoins On-chain With SG-FORGE
description: Deutsche Börse has entered a partnership with Societe Generale and SG-FORGE to integrate EUR and USD CoinVertible stablecoins into its post-trade and digital platforms, supporting MiCA-aligned settlement, collateral and liquidity processes and preparing market infrastructure for CBDC pilots. The post Deutsche Börse Brings MiCA-Ready Stablecoins On-chain With SG-FORGE appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Revolut Taps Polygon for Crypto Remittances, Processing $690M Since Integration
description: Revolut has partnered with Polygon Labs to add USDC, USDT and POL transfers on Polygon, extending stablecoin remittances, low-fee cross-border payments, in-app POL staking and a fiat-to-crypto on-ramp to millions of users across the UK and European Economic Area. The post Revolut Taps Polygon for Crypto Remittances, Processing $690M Since Integration appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Amplify Launches XRP-Based Option Income ETF
description: Amplify ETFs has introduced the first XRP-based option income exchange-traded fund, the Amplify XRP 3% Monthly Premium Income ETF (XRPM). The post Amplify Launches XRP-Based Option Income ETF appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Libra Token Insiders Drain Millions From Failed Meme Coin to Buy the Solana Dip Amid Probe
description: Libra Token wallets have continued shifting millions from the collapsed memecoin into Solana as U.S. and Argentine judges have frozen assets, investigators have traced cross-chain transfers, and analysts have assessed political fallout from Javier Milei’s association with the project. title: Zcash Price Prediction as ZEC Becomes a Top 20 Global Crypto – Can it Overtake XRP?

title: LevelField Wins Illinois Nod To Acquire Burling Bank For Crypto Services
description: LevelField has received Illinois approval to acquire Chicago-based Burling Bank and has proposed combining FDIC-insured community banking with crypto custody, trading, and credit products while the transaction awaits Federal Reserve review. The post LevelField Wins Illinois Nod To Acquire Burling Bank For Crypto Services appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Dimensional Becomes Second Firm to Win SEC ETF-Mutual Fund Hybrid Approval
description: Dimensional Fund Advisors secured SEC approval to operate ETF and mutual fund share classes in a single structure, positioning itself as the first to apply this hybrid model to actively managed strategies while nearly 90 other firms await similar clearance. The post Dimensional Becomes Second Firm to Win SEC ETF-Mutual Fund Hybrid Approval appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Canada Approves Budget That Advances Policy for Stablecoins
